text: Boola; “Esie shebaboolelanga mbu endi nende ebiachi bia Nyasaye (ebelesie shiosishiosi shia mwenya) Nohomba mbu ndamanya akefisile, nohomba shebaboolela mbu esie endi Malaika tawe, Esie shenondanga halali kalia kefimbulilwe. Boola mbu; “koo omuwofu nende owetsimoni ulolanga bakhaba nashilala? Shimuparangakhwo tawe
